doc.title: 101st Regiment, French Infantry
doc.plot: "An unusually fine marching picture of a French regiment of the line in heavy marching order. This picture is very fine photographically, and the men come so close to the camera that one gets a good idea of the equipment and make up of the French soldier."

"An unusually fine marching picture of a French regiment of the line in heavy marching order. This picture is very fine photographically, and the men come so close to the camera that one gets a good idea of the equipment and make up of the French soldier."
